Description:
Delightful downsizer in great location
Showcasing immaculate low-maintenance style, this generously-proportioned residence offers charming light-filled living in a secluded part of town.
Perfectly positioned in a quiet street, it's hard to believe this whisper-quiet, two-bedroom home is situated in the heart of Newcomb just moments from a vibrant shopping complex, close to public transport, schools and in easy reach of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Offering an ultra-convenient lifestyle on 365 sqm, this move-in ready property will appeal to those looking to downsize, first-home buyers and investors alike as the popular suburb continues to thrive.
Set on a corner allotment, the home's focus is an open plan entertaining zone where the quality kitchen with induction cooktop and plenty of bench-space overlooks a large sundrenched lounge and dining area, ideal for entertaining guests.
The tranquil front master bedroom features a walk-in robe and large floor-to-ceiling windows while the second bedroom with built-in robes is also spacious, bright and meticulously maintained.
Both bedrooms share a separate powder room and sparkling central bathroom complemented by sleek tiles and quality fittings and fixtures that are sure to impress.
Wanting for nothing, this neat home also features central heating and refrigerated cooling, large laundry, established gardens and oversized lock-up garage/home office with loads of storage.
Insights: 2 Murray Street, Newcomb VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 5 other 2 bedroom house in Newcomb have recently been sold.

Description:
Character and Charm in Central Newcomb
Conveniently located on a large allotment, this Edwardian gem features all the character you would expect from an early 1900's period abode with the luxury of a modern home. Don't miss your opportunity to buy in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs.
- Timber floors, high ceilings and decorative cornices
- Open plan kitchen/meals flows to a large comfy lounge
- Well-appointed kitchen features original period stove
- Three large bedrooms with robes
- Renovated family bathroom. Undercover entertaining area
- Large 669m2 allotment with wide driveway
- Ducted heating and split system air conditioning
- Short walk to schools and Newcomb Plaza shopping
- Plenty of space to build a large garage or shed
- Ideal first home or investment property.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living at its finest!
Ideally positioned on the fringe of East Geelong and Newcomb within a short distance to Eastern park/gardens, the Bellarine Shopping Village and only 1.4km into the centre of town, whether you are looking for your first home to move straight into or a savvy investor wanting the most out of rental returns, this unit is determined to impress.
Upon entering, you will immediately notice how nice and neat this unit has presented itself. Featuring two generous-sized bedrooms each with BIRs offering plenty of storage options. Offering a spacious central living zone that features split system heating and cooling. The updated kitchen is sure to impress with quality appliances such as gas cook top and plenty of storage in the kitchen. A central bathroom and toilet services the whole unit and a neat back yard offers a hassle-free living style. Plus a good sized single lock up garage!
A low maintenance lifestyle awaits the lucky buyer of this delightful home. Appealing to the investor, first homebuyer or even the young couple. Enquire today and you will be impressed.

Description:
Exquisite Elegance, Elite Locale
First impressions count for everything and with this attractive façade, this captivating residence reveals a meticulously renovated and extended home which combines period elegance with a modern edge.
Situated only minutes' walk to the Geelong Botanical Gardens, East Geelong Shopping Precinct, Geelong CBD and the vibrant waterfront, this address is hard to surpass. This impressive home has lots of appeal and is ready for a family to occupy with a zoned floor plan which flows seamlessly from indoor to outdoor.
The beautiful main bedroom features a luxurious ensuite and large walk in robe is complemented by two equally stunning bedrooms serviced by the similarly impressive family bathroom and a study/office. A separate formal lounge room with ornate fireplace.
A bright and well equipped kitchen/Butler’s pantry incorporating top of the range stainless steel appliances throughout. Adjacent to this space is the living and dining room opening through bi-fold doors to the decked outdoor entertaining area which is an entertainers dream with a fully equipped outdoor kitchen including built in BBQ.
The rear of the home features a triple car garage with remote control access and on the second storey a large self-contained apartment with a bathroom, perfect for a teenagers retreat/guest accommodation or a home office.
Entirely comfortable for immediate enjoyment, this enchanting home also includes ducted central heating, evaporative and reverse cycle air conditioning, high ceilings, stunning leadlight glass and low maintenance gardens.
Positioned in one of East Geelong's premier streets and only minute's drive to local schools, Geelong Hospital, South Geelong railway station and less than 30 minutes drive to the ever popular Bellarine Peninsula. An inspection will not disappoint.

Address: 10 Grafton Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Calling All Tradies, Investors, Renovators & First Homebuyers!
Bursting with potential, this property is ideal for tradies, investors, renovators, or those looking to break into the property market (STCA)! With the interiors awaiting completion, potential buyers can finish the updates in their preferred style (STCA).
Positioned close to the Breakwater industrial zone, this location will instantly appeal to tradies who work in the area. Shops and cafes are within close reach, while Buckley’s Entertainment Centre is only a short stroll away for a great meal. Just jump in the car, and you’ll be at East Geelong Primary School, Newcomb Secondary College, or the Bellarine Highway shopping centres in an instant. Easy access to public transport, St. Albans Reserve sporting grounds, and Gordon Tafe’s East Geelong Campus is another plus.
The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the centre of the home, with the kitchen equipped with a built-in pantry, oven, and gas hob. Two sliding doors provide access to outdoor areas - the courtyard soaks up the morning sun, while the concreted outdoor zone could be used for vehicle storage or transformed into an outdoor entertaining zone (STCA).
The spacious Master Bedroom is complete with and en suite and outdoor access. Zoned to the front of the home, two additional bedrooms (one with built-in robes) share close access to the semi-renovated bathroom. The laundry features storage and external access.
Modcons include two gas wall heaters, two air conditioners, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans.
The gabled carport with lock-up roller door provides storage for caravans, boats, or trailers. With the carport leading to the concreted yard, there is plentiful off-street parking available. Two storage sheds add the final touch.
Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Lifestyle Opportunity in Geelong's Leafy East
This low-maintenance property is the perfect first home, down-sizer or investment in one of the most exclusive pockets of East Geelong.
Situated only minutes from Eastern Gardens and Geelong Waterfront amongst the beautiful tree-lined streets in the East, this home offers value in its fantastic location with further opportunity to update and improve.
Comprising of two generous bedrooms, spacious light-filled living and large kitchen this home has a charm and comfort that draws you in to its homely feel.
Outdoors, a fantastic merbau deck provides the perfect entertaining area complete with undercover space for the bbq and easy access to the kitchen. Established trees around the perimeter contribute to the privacy and seclusion of this beautiful outdoor area.
Including gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, single garage with additional carport, this home offers comfortable living with a low-maintenance garden. Spend your weekends enjoying all this area has to offer rather than slaving away in the garden!
If you know the East Geelong market, you will see the outstanding potential this property offers as an investment in any capacity, be it as an owner occupier, renovator or investor. This is a fantastic opportunity at entry-level in the beautiful East.
Approximate rental $350-$370 per week.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 30 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
CALLING ALL TRADIES, INVESTORS OR FHB
This neat 3 bed, 1 bath 6 car weatherboard property set on 665 m2 block with huge shedding facilities would suit a tradie, business owner or investor with happy tenants willing to stay.
Comprising of new front deck and large front living room with gas heater, ceiling fan and brand new AKAI split system AC for all year round comfort.
Down the hall you will find 3 generous sized bedrooms and a main bathroom offering stand alone shower, separate bath and heat lamps for those cold mornings.
The central kitchen has original floorboards and offers a gas upright cooker, ample cupboard storage plus a spacious meals area which comfortable seats up to 4.
Towards the rear of the home there is a separate toilet and spacious laundry facilities which lead out onto a rear deck and flat backyard.
Outside you will find excellent shedding facilities suitable to house at least 3+ cars , a trailer, campervan or even a plane!
There is also ample parking in the drive and handy side carport.
This great property is ideally located a stones throw to Newcomb Shops in one direction and over the bridge to Belmont Shopping complex. 3km to Geelong CBD and 5min walk to nearby parks and sporting facilities.
FEATURES
Excellent shedding facilities
Heat / Cooling
Brand new gas HWS
New Roof
Happy tenants $280-$310 pw
Insights: 13 Fellmongers Road, Breakwater VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Move Right In With Nothing To Do!
Take one step inside and feel at ease with the work, love and dedication that's been poured into this family home. When you head beyond the front garden, you'll walk inside to enjoy the WOW factor! With quality floor tiles and carpets creating a warm flow throughout the home. The three zoned bedrooms are all of a good size, the master enjoys BIR's, a split system unit and serviced by an updated central family bathroom. The formal living room features a split system as well and flows through to the dining room that opens onto a contemporary kitchen with quality appliances, a brand new dishwasher and an abundance of cupboard space. If you're an entertainer, there is a rear living room with a split system unit which leads out to the enclosed alfresco area complete with fully flued wood fire - the perfect spot to wine and dine with plenty of room outside for the family or pets which also features an undercover BBQ area and even a vegie patch on the side. An additional front entrance enables access for storing a caravan, boat or trailer.
This home is loaded with extras including: Daikin ducted heating and refrigerated cooling that can be zoned on/off; 6 TV points; ceiling fans throughout; 2.0kwt (8 panel) solar power system; Gas hot water system; insulation to the ceiling; secure electric gates to both front entrances; 7,000lt water tank storage; outdoor sink for the tradie or fisherman; tandem double garage and single carport parking.
With this superb location, you are directly opposite sporting facilities and family park area, there are bus stops almost at your front door, Buckley's Entertainment Centre is a minute's walk away, East Primary School & Gordon Tafe College are within walking distance, both Bellarine Shopping Centres, Newcomb Secondary College and Geelong High School are only a few minutes' drive as is the Geelong CBD and waterfront.
To enjoy all of the hard work that's been placed into this extra special home, don't delay and call today as this is a must inspection and one that won't last long!
Terms: 10% Deposit, 60/90 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
No excuses to get into the market!
Located close to schools, shops and sporting reserve is this neat and tidy 2 bedroom home which has the potential to be converted to 3 bedrooms. Perfect as an investment, first home or simply a new property to call home, this is one opportunity you won't want to miss. This 2-bedroom residence is well presented on a large 591sqm size block. It is clearly presented with pride, showcasing a spacious bright lounge and dining room. The kitchen is original with options to update, gas cooking and plenty of bench space. There are two main living areas, one towards the rear and the other towards the front of the home. Two spacious bedrooms with built-in robes (main with toilet, shower and vanity) are also are serviced by the central bathroom. Outside leads to a securely fenced, leafy yard where the new owner can entertain or enjoy the quiet surrounds. Features include 3kw solar panels, 2 car garage, side access, ducted heating This home is a pleasant surprise and is awaiting your inspection today.

Description:
Invest or live the choice is yours.
Here is your opportunity to secure a solid three bedroom home on the edge of East Geelong in the increasingly popular area of Thomson.
Comprising of a sun drenched living room with free standing cabinetry and gas heating plus a good sized kitchen. To the rear of the home you will find the master bedroom with built in robes and a further two bedrooms both with free standing robes. The central bathroom has a separate shower and bath. The rear yard has an undercover pergola area for the entertainers along with a large bungalow that can be used for a fourth bedroom, storage space or cubby for the kids and single car garage. Conveniently located close to schools, TAFE, shops and only a few minutes by car to the CBD and Geelong waterfront.

Description:
Immaculate Home in Prized Location
Set in one of East Geelong's most picturesque and sought-after pockets, this immaculately presented home will appeal to all buyers. Combining beautiful character features with modern fittings and finishes, this low maintenance property presents the perfect opportunity to enter the East Geelong market without having to lift a finger.
The stunning façade has been reinvigorated in a modern colour scheme which perfectly accentuates the Art Deco features. On entry, the preservation of the history of this home continues with beautiful timber paneling, character fittings and original hardwood floors.
The two generous sized bedrooms are light and spacious with excellent access to a central bathroom which has been completely updated with quality fittings and a stunning claw foot bath in keeping with the theme of the home.
The living room is adorned with stunning lead-light windows, fire place, mantle and picture rails and flows perfectly into the open dining and kitchen space. The new kitchen provides a modern workspace with quality appliances, stone benchtops, subway tiles and stunning floor tiles which blend perfectly with the style of the home.
Moving into the backyard, a large outdoor entertaining area is situated with convenient access to the kitchen. Rear lane access and large paved areas provide for ample off-street parking.
Located within minutes of South Geelong Station, Garden St Cafe precinct, Eastern Gardens and the Waterfront, this home offers an easy lifestyle in close proximity to local attractions and amenities.
So much to love, so little to do! Just move in and enjoy this gorgeous home in a fabulous location.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 60 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
Location & lifestyle in East Geelong.
Here's your opportunity to enter East Geelong at an affordable price, situated in beautiful Kernot Street, and just minutes to the CBD and the Geelong Waterfront and just a short stroll around the corner will take you to the Garden Street shopping precinct or the beautiful Eastern Park and Botanic Gardens.
This 2 bedroom Californian bungalow has some great original art deco features within, so here's your opportunity to transform this home into your own. Upon entry you're greeted by original timber art deco wall panelling, separate lounge and dining areas with beautiful ceiling rosettes and original fire place facades. A central kitchen, bathroom with another living/study area out the back. The north facing backyard has enough area for another room extension (STCA) or just to relax in and there is also rear lane access with a single carport. This property is ideal for first homebuyers and investors who want to break into the East Geelong market in a fantastic location and that's what this property is all about location, location, location.

Address: 2 Tresco Court St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Put this one top of your list!
Situated in a quiet court, minutes to local shopping centres, sporting reserves, schools and public transport, this property makes the ideal choice for a first home buyer, downsizer or investor, with a potential rental income of $350/week.
Comprising central hallway with stunning timber flooring, open plan kitchen/dining/family area. The kitchen provides plenty of bench and cupboard space, stainless steel gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher. There are three generous bedrooms, two with built in robes, master with walk in robe and ensuite. The family bathroom offers a separate bath and shower and separate toilet. Ducted heating and a split system airconditioner allow comfort all year round. Outdoors is an easy to maintain yard with an undercover area and storage shed. The single garage is remote controlled and has internal house access.
Allotment approx 292sqm.
Make your enquiries today, this property is sure to impress!

Description:
Walk to Work
Not often will you find a four bedroom character home in East Geelong such as this with secure off street parking at an affordable price level. Set on the fringe of the city and well positioned to schools, hospital and the Garden St shopping precinct this home is a real winner. Leadlight windows feature in the entry that opens to a living room which adjoins the central kitchen and air conditioned family room. Offering ample scope to renovate and add your own touches this home represents value in a fabulous central location. Call today to inspect.

Description:
Get ready to renovate.
Rarely is there an opportunity to purchase a house at this price in East Geelong. If you're looking for your next project, or your first, here is your chance to secure a piece of East Geelong real estate, at a very affordable price. Walk into the property, look past what is there now, and have a vision for the finished project, whether you renovate or redevelop (STCA) the opportunity awaits you.
The home has 2 BRs, lounge with gas heating, study, combined kitchen and meals area, bathroom to the rear and euro laundry. Step outside through the back door and you have an undercover pergola and single carport off to the side of the house,
there is also an area for a good sized courtyard out the back.
The property is well positioned, with just a short walk to the East Geelong cafe precinct, Botanical Gardens, Waterfront and Geelong CBD.
Call Jay today on 0417 057 775 to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Waiting for rejuvenation.
A great opportunity on a 538m2 (approx.) corner allotment and perfectly situated in close proximity to the waterfront and all local amenities.
With floorboards throughout this home comprises of 3 large bedrooms, 2 with BIR, 1 bathroom with bath and separate shower, WC, living / dining, separate kitchen with gas upright stove and separate laundry. Additional features include a single lock up garage, private double carport, garden shed for additional storage, gas wall heating and ceiling fan in the living area.
Located just 3.4kms or 6 minutes from Geelong CBD and ideally located in close proximity to several well regarded primary and secondary schools, Eastern Beach, Newcomb Centro, Aldi, Bellarine Village Shopping Centre on your doorstep and Splashdown Recreational Centre just moments away.
This perfect first home, downsizer or start to your property portfolio is sure to impress with opportunities abounding.

Address: 2/8 Westmoreland Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
A rare find and room to move!!
Such a rare find is this 3 Bedroom Unit in a prime location ideal for downsizers, investors or first home buyers. "Space" is the key word here with ample room to move and built with the concept of open amenity rather than density. Investors reap a healthy return on this maintenance free property (approx $300 pw)
Located on a block of only 2, this amazing single level unit is tucked away at the rear, ensuring privacy and security. Close to all amenities in a sought after location, this property will impress the most discerning buyer.
The massive central lounge/dining area, complete with modern kitchen (s/s appliances and dishwasher), opens to a spacious side area large enough for entertaining family and friends.
3 Large bedrooms with BIR and central bathroom complete the ensemble for this perfectly positioned and planned home.
Single car parking, gas heating and s/s airconditioning ensure all the creature comforts are ticked off.
Located close to all the Geelong Region has to offer, this home is close to Geelong CBD, shopping and sporting complexes.
